org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
Interface IAeEventParent

All Superinterfaces:
IAeBpelObject, IAeLocatableObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeActivityPickImpl, AeEventHandlersContainer
public interface IAeEventParent
extends IAeBpelObject

Interface for picks and eventHandlers. Provides methods for adding messages and alarms into the parent.

Method Summary
 void addAlarm(AeOnAlarm aAlarm)
          Adds the alarm to the pick or eventHandlers
 void addMessage(AeOnMessage aMessage)
          Adds the message to the pick or eventHandlers
 void childActive(IAeBpelObject aChild)
